channel.title: Is just the plain word "jew" a degrogatory term
channel.description: please vote is just saying: jew a degragtory term? no ther words invloved?

item.title: Is just the plain word "jew" a degrogatory term
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

[quote=“XxKanexX, post:9, topic:80839”][quote author=Bobby link=topic=118748.msg1166561#msg1166561 date=1176714760]
lothy`, nice use of quotes…

I think you should get rid of the bot and spend 10 seconds muting poeple who act bad. there is no automatcimods in here, why in the irc?
[/quote]
Automatic bots in IRC are about 1000 times easier to code, and they do their job just fine.[/quote]
Not to mention that mine handles most events automatically.

Read full topic

item.title: Is just the plain word "jew" a degrogatory term
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

Bobby:

I don’t, I just think you should take it out of your ban list, and take 1 second to ban soemone who uses it as a slur, and not ban someone who just says it…

lothy:

If you want to discuss the Jewish religion on IRC, in a non-racial context, then by all means form your own channel.

Read full topic
item.source: Is just the plain word "jew" a degrogatory term

item.title: Is just the plain word "jew" a degrogatory term
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

In a majority of contexts, yes.

This poll won’t change the fact that it’s staying in my ‘badword’ list. You’ve never used/mentioned the word on IRC until today, until after you found out I was censoring it. Suddenly there was this urgency for you that the word had to be available. The fact that you’ve made this post today, and not the first day you joined further proves my point.

If you want to discuss the Jewish religion on IRC, in a non-racial context, then by all means form your own channel.

Read full topic
item.source: Is just the plain word "jew" a degrogatory term

item.title: Is just the plain word "jew" a degrogatory term
item.dc:creator: @therealjdb JDB`
item.description:
@therealjdb wrote:

On another topic

nigger juice

Nigger Guy.

Nope, Jew describes someone who is Jewish. (Unless used by me, in which case please do take it offensively.)

Read full topic
item.source: Is just the plain word "jew" a degrogatory term

item.title: Is just the plain word "jew" a degrogatory term
item.dc:creator: @bobby Bobby
item.description:
@bobby wrote:

thanks lawl, bt certain bots have been proved smarter than you lol. ( just kidding or am i?)

evil, it is fine to mute degragtory slurs, and if u find one from me that isn’t being used to prove this argmnet, please kb me permanetly. but, I don’t a think a bot should mute you everytime you say jew. the bot can’t tell wehn a slur is amde, so it shouoldn’t be abel to ban for this particular word.

Read full topic
item.source: Is just the plain word "jew" a degrogatory term

item.title: Is just the plain word "jew" a degrogatory term
item.dc:creator: @Evil1 Evil_
item.description:
@Evil1 wrote:

Bobby, it’s not just the word “jew” it’s freenode’s TOS to not use any racial slurs.

Before today you never once said anything about Jews, until lothy was talking about his add-on to mute people who use them.
Then you started saying shit like “I’m a Jew why can I say it!!!??”

Mopar is the one that told us that freenode rules are our rules. Lothy, and I…along with the rest of the ops will respect moapristhebest’s wishes, so as long as he says it’s bad, to us…it’s bad.

Read full topic
item.source: Is just the plain word "jew" a degrogatory term
